SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT072
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by a Test & Training user to specify the mode of the next FIN application test session. The LT can work in either the default Full Function Mode or in Local Test Mode. Current or, when available, Future Message Type formats can be selected.
From: User To: GPA
Notes ------- Modes and formats can be changed only when FIN is not selected. The change becomes effective immediately and remains in effect until either a further test mode selection is made, or the GPA session is terminated.
For further details see the chapter describing Test & Training facilities in the SWIFTNet FIN Service Description.

SystemField.Name: test-mode-selection
SystemField.description:
Test mode selection must be one of the following:
a) FC = full function mode, current
b) FF = full function mode, future
c) LC = local test mode, current
d) LF = local test mode, future
